name: Hardest Space Game Ever - Galaxy Commando
name_original: Hardest Space Game Ever - Galaxy Commando
description:
Hardest Space Game Ever is an amazing, addictive space shooting application that will challenge your warrior skills.

Sniper your way through the Galaxy, avoiding stars, asteroids and space junk. Don't forget to pick up your double shooter and blast away.

See how far you can go!

=======Features======
> Endless Game Play
> Record Highest scores
> Integrate with Game Center
> Super Addictive

Challenge your friends to see who can go all the way.

Have fun!
